Html:
Is it possible to add support console for TypeScript like javascript console in browser?

Perhaps as Internet Explorer extension or any browser?

Have you tried TypeScript Compile? It compiles TypeScript to Javascript in browser and shows errors in the web console.

Moreover, you can call console() directly from TypeScript.
Yes, but we can't use TypeScript objects and classes in Javascript console. We can only work with compiled Javascript objects and functions.
I've done something similar to your idea - TypeScript Interpret - which is a console/terminal in JS capable of interpreting TS statements. You can check out the source code here.
